mapper.select: select * from user_info where u_id=#{u_id} and u_pass=#{u_pass}
select count(u_number) from user_info order by u_number desc
select * from(select s.*, row_number()over(order by s.u_number desc) as num from user_info s) where num>#{start} and num<=#{end}
mapper.update: update user_info set u_name = #{u_name}, u_pass = #{u_pass}, u_tell = #{u_tell}, u_gender = #{u_gender}, u_grade = #{u_grade} where u_number = #{u_number}
